moments.title: Blast from the Start
moments.description: Skaters explode off the starting line with Steven Dubois (CAN) and Roberts KrÅ«zbergs (LAT) leading the initial charge.

moments.title: Japanese Tumble Shakes Up the Race
moments.description: Shogo Miyata (JPN) loses balance and crashes during the first turn, reducing the field to four competitors.

moments.title: USA Skater Out of the Running
moments.description: Brandon Kim (USA) falls dramatically during the middle lap, eliminating him from contention and leaving three skaters.

moments.title: Dubois Sprints to Victory
moments.description: Steven Dubois (CAN) powers through the final straight to cross the finish line first, securing gold in the 500m final.

moments.title: Canadian Duo Celebrate 1-2 Finish
moments.description: Steven Dubois (CAN) and Jordan Pierre-Gilles (CAN) embrace and skate together in celebration after securing first and second place.
